allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/const \\[hoveredFeatureIdx, setHoveredFeatureIdx\\] = useState\(null\);/const [hoveredFeatureIdx, setHoveredFeatureIdx] = useState<number | null>\(null\);/g; s/const handleMouseEnter = \(index\) =>/const handleMouseEnter = \(index: number\) =>/g; s/const startAnimation = \(index\) =>/const startAnimation = \(index: number\) =>/g' "$file")
